issue.title: Please release packages for different ROS versions

content.raw:
It always was our intention to provide nightly builds for all our ROS supported flavours and it is not in the plans to change this. So what you probably want is nightly builds to be fixed, since they are currently broken for several reasons.

Give me sometime to fix this since our family of drcsim dependencies has grown quite a bit during last months.

A friendly reminder is: nightly builds are completely untested so use them with caution.
